thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 9 of 1898
thread.title: Rufino

author: Rufino
title: Rufino
text:
I used this site once to purchase a flight to Hawaii. The months leading up to the departure, it was constantly sending me updates of the changes to my flight.They also send reminders of your flight as your departure date gets closer. It is a very easy website to use for booking and keeps you very informed of your flight. I also am using this website to book another flight! I recommend this to my friends and family and they also are very happy with this website.
I would recommend using this website to anyone!
